means: 阻止某人做某事（或加入机构、去某处等）

sentence.Network_en: Estimate , debar and repair the failure of network and computers.
sentence.Network_cn: 网络系统、计算机硬件的故障判断、排除和送修.

sentence.Network_en: The railroad gates debar people from crossing the tracks.
sentence.Network_cn: 铁道的栅栏阻止行人跨越轨道.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语谐音背单词_百度知道 ... dearth  n. 缺乏,粮食不足,饥谨 debar   vt. 排除,防止,禁止 alcohol  n. 酒精，乙醇；含酒精的饮料.

list.abs: briar threaten Berea threatened to spills expel students who eat ate at places not own debar owned by the school .伯利亚学院威胁学生如果在不属于学院的地方吃饭将被开除。
美国《联... ... （a）强制性禁止（ MANDATORY DEBARMENT） （1）公司、合伙企业和团体（ CORPORATIONS, PARTNERSHIP…
they debarred persons who have been convicted of crime from voting at elections他们剥夺被定过罪者的选举投票权。
药学专业英语  ... ... permissive debarment 开放式禁止 mandatory debarment 绝对禁止 permissive debarment 开放式禁令.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French débarrer, from Old French desbarrer 'unbar', from des- (expressing reversal) + barrer 'to bar'

entry.def: If you are debarred from doing something, you are prevented from doing it by a law or regulation.

example.ex: If found guilty, she could be debarred from politics for seven years...
example.tran: 如果罪名成立，她可能在 7 年内不得从政。

example.ex: Convictions for criminal offences might lead to the persons concerned being debarred from entering the teaching profession.
example.tran: 因刑事罪名被定罪的罪犯将可能被禁止从事教师职业。

means.word_mean: 1. bar temporarily; from school, office, etc.
2. prevent the occurrence of; prevent from happening;

sentences.sentence: "He was barred from membership in the club"

auth_sentence.content: This disability need not debar a man from being a conscientious and valuable priest.
auth_sentence.res_content: This disability need not debar a man from being a conscientious and valuable priest.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This disability need not debar a man from being a conscientious and valuable priest.

means.word_mean: 阻止某人做某事(或加入机构、去某处等)

sentences.en: He was debarred from holding public office.
She was debarred from attending the meeting.
sentences.cn: 她被禁止参加这次会议。

sentences.en: Students who have not paid their fees will be debarred from taking examinations.
sentences.cn: 未交费的学生将不允许参加考试。
